The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Štrba. Slovakia has 29 ski areals across four NUTS3 (mentioned inrow57). The Štrba LAU2 is only one of the areas relevant for this VC. It is situated in the Sub-Tatra Basin, which separates the High Tatras and Low Tatras mountains. Štrba municipality includes ski, tourist, and health resort near to a famous lake Štrbské Pleso.
